sword.name: Sword
sword.description: A sharp and reliable blade, perfectly balanced for combat.

bone.name: Bone
bone.description: A sturdy animal bone that can serve as a makeshift club.

shadow_blade.name: Shadow Blade
shadow_blade.description: A mysterious blade that seems to absorb light. It feels unnaturally cold to the touch.

hunter_bow.name: Hunter's Bow
hunter_bow.description: A well-crafted bow perfect for hunting or combat at a distance.

stone_sword.name: Stone Sword
stone_sword.description: A crudely made but effective sword chipped from stone.

poison_darts_weapon.name: Poison Darts
poison_darts_weapon.description: Darts tipped with venom. Causes poison on hit. Limited uses.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: A sturdy wooden shield reinforced with metal bands.

boxer.name: Boxer
boxer.description: A set of hardened leather armor, providing decent protection while remaining flexible.

shadow_cloak.name: Shadow Cloak
shadow_cloak.description: A cloak woven from strange dark fibers that seem to blend with shadows. Enhances stealth and fleeing.

iron_breastplate.name: Iron Breastplate
iron_breastplate.description: Heavy but protective iron armor that covers the chest and back.

miner_helmet.name: Miner's Helmet
miner_helmet.description: A sturdy helmet with a small, dim light source.

crafted_shadow_armor.name: Crafted Shadow Armor
crafted_shadow_armor.description: Leather armor infused with shadow essence and reinforced with iron.

reinforced_shield_item.name: Reinforced Shield
reinforced_shield_item.description: A wooden shield heavily reinforced with iron ingots.

healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
healing_potion.description: A red liquid that bubbles slightly. Drinking it restores some of your health.

greater_healing_potion.name: Greater Healing Potion
greater_healing_potion.description: A deep crimson liquid that glows faintly. Drinking it restores a significant amount of health.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.description: A bitter green liquid that can neutralize most poisons when consumed.

strength_elixir.name: Strength Elixir
strength_elixir.description: A fizzing yellow liquid that temporarily increases your attack power for 3 turns.

elixir_of_wisdom.name: Elixir of Wisdom
elixir_of_wisdom.description: A shimmering blue liquid. Drinking it might grant you a moment of clarity or a hint.

healing_salve.name: Healing Salve
healing_salve.description: A soothing salve made from potent herbs, effectively healing wounds.

sticks.name: Sticks
sticks.description: Common wooden sticks, useful for crafting or building fires.

leather.name: Leather
leather.description: Tanned animal hide, flexible yet durable. Essential for many crafting recipes.

shadow_essence.name: Shadow Essence
shadow_essence.description: A swirling dark substance collected from defeated shadow creatures. Used in powerful crafting recipes.

iron_ore.name: Iron Ore
iron_ore.description: Raw chunks of iron-rich rock that can be smelted into pure iron.

herbs.name: Herbs
herbs.description: Various medicinal plants with healing properties when properly prepared.

cloth.name: Cloth
cloth.description: Scraps of cloth, useful for basic crafting and bandages.

iron_ingot.name: Iron Ingot
iron_ingot.description: A bar of smelted iron, used in various crafting recipes.

spider_venom.name: Spider Venom
spider_venom.description: Potent venom carefully extracted from a giant spider. Highly toxic.

forest_map.name: Forest Map
forest_map.description: A worn parchment showing paths through the forest and marking points of interest.

ancient_medallion.name: Ancient Medallion
ancient_medallion.description: A mysterious bronze medallion with strange symbols etched around its edge.

glowing_crystal.name: Glowing Crystal
glowing_crystal.description: A crystal that emits a bright, steady blue light, illuminating dark areas effectively.

pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
pickaxe.description: A sturdy pickaxe, essential for mining ore.

ancient_gear.name: Ancient Gear
ancient_gear.description: A complex gear made of an unknown metal. It hums with a faint energy.

hermit_amulet.name: Hermit's Amulet
hermit_amulet.description: A simple wooden amulet, warm to the touch. It feels protective.

ancient_tablet.name: Ancient Tablet
ancient_tablet.description: A heavy stone tablet covered in intricate, faded runes. It seems to be a fragment of a larger text.

simple_raft_item.name: Simple Raft
simple_raft_item.description: A makeshift raft for crossing water.

basic_torch_item.name: Basic Torch
basic_torch_item.description: A lit torch to see in the dark.

simple_raft_recipe.description: Combine sticks and leather to create a simple raft.

basic_torch_recipe.description: Wrap cloth around a stick and light it to make a torch.

crafted_shadow_armor_recipe.description: Infuse leather armor with shadow essence and reinforce with iron to create mysterious protective gear.

iron_ingot_recipe.description: Smelt two pieces of iron ore to create a solid iron ingot.

reinforced_shield_recipe.description: Reinforce a standard shield with iron ingots for increased durability and protection.

healing_salve_recipe.description: Combine herbs and cloth to create a potent healing salve.

poison_darts_recipe.description: Fashion small darts from sticks and tip them with potent spider venom.
